prompts: Create a winter-themed Pokemon with a red and white color scheme.
Design a cute, snow-loving bird Pokemon that has a joyful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a delivery service with festive colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that delivers gifts, featuring a playful and cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the holidays with a unique design.
Make a character inspired by a penguin, but with bright colors and whimsical features.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it just came from a snowy mountain adventure.

distinctive_features: A small pouch for carrying items
